repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
Catalog information on white paper written in black ink pen by V Raghavan : Smṛtimuktāphala of Vaidyanātha Dīkṣita of South India Prāyaścitta + Varṇāśrama books. 188, 14-13 linien is written in pencil on the same paper. Prāyaścitta book is incomplete. No completion statement for Varṇāśrama book is found. First folio is very faint and letters are unreadable.
line 1 and 2 on 1r are almost not readable. 1r 3 tyevaṃ prati …..

msItem.title: Smṛtimuktaphala : Prāyaścitta and Varṇāśrama Kāṇḍas
msItem.author: Vaidyanātha Dīkṣita
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 syanti kye . viṣayiṇā ya samartho vikule 1v 8 naṃ māsananta dudā?srataṃ uktānāṃ yati pātrāṇāṃ sakalyā?pi parigrahaṃ .
msItem.explicit: [213?]r 14 tārakaṃ yāvat pīḍyante vividhairvidhaiḥ . atipātipātikaścānye nirarāyāṇyavakoṭiṣu evaṃvitisaṃkhyeṣu pādonabrahmakalpakaṃ caturdhaśasu pacyante kalpārdhaṃ samapā

support.p: Guard folio brown wooden thick folio.

extent.measure: 182 folio 4 blank folio and 2 guard folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numbers in the left margin on recto of the folio. Numbering is not consistant.
supportDesc.condition: Good state of preservation. Despite the fact that it is challenging to read, several folios have very pale ink.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.

TEI.text:
1v 1 syanti kye . viṣayiṇā ya samartho vikule 1v 8 naṃ māsananta dudā?srataṃ uktānāṃ yati pātrāṇāṃ sakalyā?pi parigrahaṃ . 2r 1 ? (śraṇya) vairaṃ kurvīta kenapi tya? kurantaṃ taṃ pratikurḍyet ākṛṣṭā kuśalaṃ vadet ..
112v 13 pahārakaṃ yatayha tāṃ riktāṃgamapi yanutāṃ prati nāsikaṃ . tai prabṛti tailapāyīsyāt prativakraasya sūcakaṃ āmayā vikajī? ? samavāgata (4 syllables illegible) prāyaścittakāṇḍa hariḥ oṃ 1
[213?]r 1 śrīrāmacaraṇāṃbhoja līnamānasaṣaṭpadaḥ vaidyanāthādhvari prāyaścitta saṃgṛhya bhāṣate .. atha prāyaścittakāṇḍaṃ ārabyate . prāyo nāma tapaḥ citas cisca [213?]r 2 yaḥ ..
[213?]r 14 tārakaṃ yāvat pīḍyante vividhairvidhaiḥ . atipātipātikaścānye nirarāyāṇyavakoṭiṣu evaṃvitisaṃkhyeṣu pādonabrahmakalpakaṃ caturdhaśasu pacyante kalpārdhaṃ samapā
